oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Captain Josiah R. Gale to sister Anna M. Gale
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Captain Josiah R. Gale, Co. H, 29th Mississippi Infantry, CSA to his sister, Miss Anna M. Gale. He writes of engagement on Lookout Mountain. "Just imagine it, dark as midnight could be, with a heavy fogg, smoke as thick as could be, facing each other about 75 yds a part, then the blazes offire shooting forth from thousands of guns the noise created on both sides, dead and wounded lying around."
